snippet: Thanks to a mild winter and abundant spring sunshine, the strawberry crop on Long Island arrived early, drawing pick-your-own enthusiasts to berry farms ahead of schedule at some places.
abstract: Strawberry crop on Long Island arrives early, thanks to a mild winter and abundant spring sunshine, drawing pick-your-own enthusiasts to berry farms ahead of schedule (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: Thanks to a mild winter and abundant spring sunshine, the strawberry crop on Long Island arrived early, drawing pick-your-own enthusiasts to berry farms ahead of schedule at some places.

headline.seo: An Early Season at Pick-Your-Own Strawberry Farms on Long Island
headline.main: It’s Early Pickings in the Berry Fields
headline.print_headline: It’s Early Pickings In the Berry Fields
